title: (x) Looking for a (free) font that has a soccer ball in it
content:
Hi all,  
Where can I find a (free) font that has a soccer ball in it?

[http://www.threadless.com/submission/44389/succer](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017075644/http:/www.threadless.com/submission/44389/succer "http://www.threadless.com/submission/44389/succer")

-Will

 [‹ (x) NBC's new corporate typeface - SF Chaerilidae {Ben}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017075644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15984 "Go to previous forum topic") [wide squarish tech sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017075644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15985 "Go to next forum topic")
author: winglets747

comments.content: You can do it with Illustrator

[This](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017075644/http:/dafont.com/en/author.php?author=446) has a football in it and is free but frankly looks badly drawn. David’s suggestion is probably best [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017075644/http:/www.awebtester.co.uk/html/football/footballs2.htm) are some images.  
Tim
